detail_desc: Trousers in rustly nylon with a high waist and tapered legs. Elastication and an elastic drawstring at the waist and hems, and patch front pockets.
Trousers in rustly nylon with a high waist and tapered legs. Elastication and an elastic drawstring at the waist and hems, and patch front pockets.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey. Relaxed fit with a V-neck.

Short, A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a smocked section at the top framed by a flounced trim front and back. Voluminous, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and ties at the back. Unlined.

Trainers with chunky, patterned soles and sections in imitation leather, imitation suede and mesh. Padded top edge, a tongue and lacing at the front. Piqué linings and insoles. Some of the polyester content of the trainers is recycled.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.

Set with a sleeveless romper suit and long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey. Romper suit with button-front shoulder straps, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with lapped shoulders.
Elasticated, fabric-covered scrunchies.
Elasticated, fabric-covered scrunchies.
Elasticated, fabric-covered scrunchies.
Elasticated, fabric-covered scrunchies.
Blouse in a viscose weave. Large collar with a gathered lace trim, pearly, metal-rimmed buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a seam with a wide, gathered peplum at the hem.
Blouse in a viscose weave. Large collar with a gathered lace trim, pearly, metal-rimmed buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a seam with a wide, gathered peplum at the hem.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight legs that taper gently to the hem with creases.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight legs that taper gently to the hem with creases.
Round sunglasses with narrow metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Round sunglasses with narrow metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with contrasting colour seams. High waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Straight-style, long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with print motifs front, back and on the sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Straight-style, long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with print motifs front, back and on the sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with lace trims, and a yoke with lace frill trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a lace frill trim at the cuffs.
Trousers in stretch denim made from a cotton blend. Concealed elastication, a small frill trim and a press-stud at the waist, a fake fly, fake front and real back pockets. Patterned cotton lining.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.

Knee-length, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Cylindrical bag in woven fabric with handles and a shoulder strap in a contrasting colour. Recycled polyester lining. Length 39 cm. Height 22 cm.
Cycling shorts in ribbed jersey. High waist with covered elastication.
Cycling shorts in ribbed jersey. High waist with covered elastication.
Cycling shorts in ribbed jersey. High waist with covered elastication.
Leather loafers with a decorative metal buckle at the front. Leather linings and insoles.

Hobo bag in soft imitation leather with a zip and handle at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Two zipped outer pockets. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 9 cm. Width 34 cm. Height 37 cm.

Shirt jacket in sturdy denim made from a cotton blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Tops in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tops in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Zip-through hoodies in soft sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hoodies in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with a double-layered, drawstring hood, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hoodies in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with a double-layered, drawstring hood, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in a cotton weave. High, frill-trimmed waist with covered elastication, and a gathered seam for added volume in the skirt. Unlined.
Short skirt in a soft, textured weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Short, fitted skirt in velour with decorative embroidery on the front and concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a padded, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and zipped side pockets. Detachable, elasticated belt with a metal buckle at the waist, and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with inset lace trims at the top, a small frill trim around the neckline and a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Gathered yoke at the back and short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with wide smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam under the bust with concealed, covered elastication at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with wide smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam under the bust with concealed, covered elastication at the back. Unlined.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in an airy weave made from a modal blend with narrow notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and diagonal welt side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Unlined.

Trousers in patterned sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué at the top. Relaxed fit with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet pockets in the side seams, and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatpants is recycled.
Faux fur gilet with a V-neck, hook-and-eye fastening at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.4 cm.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbing at the cuffs. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbing at the cuffs. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbing at the cuffs. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.

Knee-length dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a scallop-edged stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Short, scallop-edged sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared, pleated skirt. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with a scallop-edged stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Short, scallop-edged sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared, pleated skirt. Unlined.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative metal chain on the front. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather.
Fitted, turtleneck jumper in a fine, rib-knit viscose blend with a soft, brushed finish. Long sleeves with beaded appliqués on the shoulders.
Sleeveless dress in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a grosgrain bow at the sides. Soft jersey lining.
Sleeveless dress in lace with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a grosgrain bow at the sides. Soft jersey lining.
Short-sleeved dress in crinkled jersey with a super-voluminous skirt in four layers of tulle. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a shimmering tone-on-tone elastic trim at the waist.
Short-sleeved dress in crinkled jersey with a super-voluminous skirt in four layers of tulle. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a shimmering tone-on-tone elastic trim at the waist.
Metal studs in various shapes and designs, some decorated with rhinestones. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Chunky soles that are patterned underneath for a good grip. Heel 3.5 cm.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Chunky soles that are patterned underneath for a good grip. Heel 3.5 cm.

Cotton twill shirt jacket in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders that have a tab and button. Flap chest pockets, discreet side pockets and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Gently rounded hem. Unlined.

Cotton twill shirt jacket in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders that have a tab and button. Flap chest pockets, discreet side pockets and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative tie detail at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative tie detail at the hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and decorative flounces front and back that start at the neck and extend down the sleeves. Straight-cut top section with a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide seam at the hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and decorative flounces front and back that start at the neck and extend down the sleeves. Straight-cut top section with a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide seam at the hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and decorative flounces front and back that start at the neck and extend down the sleeves. Straight-cut top section with a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide seam at the hem.
Short coat in faux fur with large notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a double-layered turtle neck and long sleeves.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a double-layered turtle neck and long sleeves.
